info.name: Stabyourself Forum Dark Theme
info.description: Change the stabyourself forum theme into a dark theme
info.additionalInfo:

Sep 9 2015: Changed some button
Sep 10-11 2015: Changed admin's username color, reputation popup, and some text forum color, and the code box color change

Jan 3 2016: Added new dark icon for topics. By constachugga.
Feb 13 2016: FINALLY added the color when hoverring the forums
Mars 11 2016: Added some locked dark icon for topics. This time by myself.
Mars 16 2016: Added the annoucement's color, and MANY icons.
Mars 19 2016: Just added 2 new icons.
